remarks: The identity arrow in the category of rings is the identity function. (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringccatOLD.c $e |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) $.
ringcidOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcidOLD.o $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
ringcidOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcidOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringcidOLD.s $e |- S = ( Base ` X ) $.
ringcidOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` S ) ) $.
